languages.text: "Арбитры неподкупны. Неважно, что это — золото или особое отношение, нас интересует лишь долг. Доброта местных не помогает получить данные о десятине, и это главное, что мне надо знать".

traits.locale_text: "Вы все еще верите в добро и искренность? Они улыбаются, потому что ими движет не слепое варварство, а чей-то план, тактика. И они ждут... знака. Или определенного момента".

languages.text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."
languages.original_text: "Арбитры неподкупны. Неважно, что это — золото или особое отношение, нас интересует лишь долг. Доброта местных не помогает получить данные о десятине, и это главное, что мне надо знать".

traits.locale_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed. Neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' kindness is not conductive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

"An Arbitrator cannot be bribed. Neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' kindness is not conductive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

"An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

languages.text: "Ein Arbitrator kann nicht bestochen werden, weder durch Gold noch durch Spezialbehandlungen. Uns interessiert allein unsere Pflicht. Die Freundlichkeit der Einheimischen trägt nicht dazu bei, Daten zum Zehnt zu erheben, und nur das zählt für mich."
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Arbitrator kann nicht bestochen werden, weder durch Gold noch durch Spezialbehandlungen. Uns interessiert allein unsere Pflicht. Die Freundlichkeit der Einheimischen trägt nicht dazu bei, Daten zum Zehnt zu erheben, und nur das zählt für mich."

languages.text: « Un arbitrator ne se laisse pas soudoyer, que ce soit avec de l'or ou des traitements de faveur. Rien ne peut nous détourner de notre devoir. Ce qui m'importe le plus actuellement, c'est d'obtenir des données sur la dîme, et ce n'est pas l'amabilité de ces gens qui nous le permettra. »
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

traits.locale_text: « Un arbitrator ne se laisse pas soudoyer, que ce soit avec de l'or ou des traitements de faveur. Rien ne peut nous détourner de notre devoir. Ce qui m'importe le plus actuellement, c'est d'obtenir des données sur la dîme, et ce n'est pas l'amabilité de ces gens qui nous le permettra. »

languages.text: 「アービトレイターが買収されることはありません。金によっても、特別な待遇によっても、決して。私たちが関心を持つのは、ただ職務を果たすことだけです。地元民の愛想の良さは、租税に関する情報を得る助けにはなりません。私にとって重要なのは、その情報なのです」
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターが買収されることはありません。金によっても、特別な待遇によっても、決して。私たちが関心を持つのは、ただ職務を果たすことだけです。地元民の愛想の良さは、租税に関する情報を得る助けにはなりません。私にとって重要なのは、その情報なのです」

languages.text: «No se puede sobornar a un Arbitrator, ni con oro ni con trato de favor. Cumplir nuestro deber es lo único que nos motiva. La afabilidad de los lugareños es irrelevante a la hora de recabar datos sobre el diezmo, que es lo que me importa».
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

traits.locale_text: «No se puede sobornar a un Arbitrator, ni con oro ni con trato de favor. Cumplir nuestro deber es lo único que nos motiva. La afabilidad de los lugareños es irrelevante a la hora de recabar datos sobre el diezmo, que es lo que me importa».

languages.text: “法务官是无法贿赂的，无论是金子，还是别的特殊待遇。我们唯一在乎的事情，就是履行我们的职责。对我而言，什一税就是最重要的事情。至于当地人是否友好，这与什一税的相关事项无关。”
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

traits.locale_text: “法务官是无法贿赂的，无论是金子，还是别的特殊待遇。我们唯一在乎的事情，就是履行我们的职责。对我而言，什一税就是最重要的事情。至于当地人是否友好，这与什一税的相关事项无关。”

languages.text: "Biz Yargıcılar, ne altınla ne de özel muameleyle satın alınabiliriz. Tek derdimiz, vazifemizi yerine getirmektir. Yerel halkın misafirperverliğinin aşara dair veri elde etmemize yardım ettiği söylenemez, beni asıl ilgilendiren de bu zaten."
languages.original_text: "An Arbitrator cannot be bribed — neither with gold nor with special treatment. Doing our duty is all that concerns us. The locals' affability is not conducive to obtaining data on the tithe, and that is what matters to me."

traits.locale_text: "Biz Yargıcılar, ne altınla ne de özel muameleyle satın alınabiliriz. Tek derdimiz, görevimizi yerine getirmektir. Yerel halkın misafirperverliğinin aşara dair veri elde etmemize yardım ettiği söylenemez, beni asıl ilgilendiren de bu zaten."
